title: Survival texts
description:
My personal collection of PDF files and short video or audio recordings. 
One goal in mind. 
A comprehensive collection of all my survival texts free for the internet and not for sale by some fear mongering leech of a company. There really is a lot wrong with the world but using knowledge that could be life or death for profit just isn't cool in my book.

Now if they offered classes and workshops in addition to the books that would be one thing. But no. It is miles of useful data that does not mean anything to people not already scared out of their minds because they spin the global situation as one of dire circumstances that just can't wait for you to decide if your wallet isn't already light enough.

I promise the world will keep spinning.

Here is some useful stuff if you want to keep being a part of it should the SHTF.
